title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with grated Parmesan and black pepper.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with eggs and pancetta.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until cooked through.
Fry onions, add tomato puree and cook into sauce.
Add chicken and cream, simmer until thickened.
